resources.string: A widget that can be freely resized and whose contents can be controlled by programs in Termux.
Use a program to fill this widget
Please enable overlays in the app permissions.

These settings are for the foreground service with the notification and only apply once it restarts.\nIf you want to apply these settings now, click the button to kill the service. That will also disconnect all programs using the plugin at the moment.

How many seconds the service stays active when there are no connections. If a program wants to connect and the service is still active, the startup time is shorter. A negative value means the service is never shut down automatically.

If enabled, this makes the service go into the background and hide the notification if there are no active connections. Use this with a negative value above to let the servic always be ready in the background.
